front.title: I2NSF Network Security Functions Facing Interface YANG Data Model

abstract.t: This document defines a YANG data model corresponding to the information model for Network Security Functions (NSF) facing interface in Interface to Network Security Functions (I2NSF). It describes a data model for three security capabilities (i.e., network security functions), such as network security control, content security control, and attack mitigation control, as defined in the information model for the I2NSF NSF capabilities.
